wikipedia_page.main: Troy Kavon Caesar (born 13 May 1994) is a British Virgin Islands international footballer who plays as a central defender for United Premier Soccer League side Potros FC.

link_mentions.page: British Virgin Islands national football team

response: After a tip off from his Andrew College teammate Troy Caesar, Jones was called up to the British Virgin Islands national team for their 2017 Caribbean Cup qualification matches against Martinique and Dominica. Jones appeared in both matches.
